I recieved an e-mail that stated that Obama was in talks with the UN about signing the small arms gun treaty and has found (Obama) a loophole which will allow him to bypass the constitution and needs no congressional voting to do so, is there any truth to this.

I recieved an e-mail that stated that Obama was in talks with the UN about signing the small arms gun treaty and has found (Obama) a loophole which will allow him to bypass the constitution and needs no congressional voting to do so, is there any truth to this.

 
 The first part is true. The part about the loophole, I'm not seeing anything that would suggest there's any truth to it. The Supreme Court has said that no international treaty can supersede our own Constitution, so that's how it is.
